Detailed Description

InputSystem Implementation of the ISystem interface for generic Input functionality.

Member Function Documentation

pcstr InputSystem::GetName ( void   )  [protected, virtual]

Implementation of the ISystem::GetName function. Gets the name of the system. Only custom systems can return a custom name.

Returns:
pcstr - The name of the system.
